fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Set up an impossibility engine outside a targetâ€™s house

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Visitors of your target has a high chance for something improbable to happen to them, such as them not getting their results, them being shot by a veteran, or just straight disappearing.
-These effects can also benefit your target, such as give them basic defense, or healing them. These are extremely less likely to happen though
-All of your visitors have a 10% chance to noclip out of the town, killing them instantly with a overkill attack
-This role can only spawn if there is exactly 2 unique roles in the game
